item.description:

Made at Lime Wharf Machines Room as part of Rhythm & Drone // Research & Development residency, September 2015. https://rhythmanddrone.wordpress.com/ Supported using public funding by the National Lottery through Arts Council England

The Mind - Alan Watts
item.description:
The Mind - Alan Watts

Alan Watts speaks on worrying and compulsive thinking. Audio Courtesy of Alan Watts.org alanwatts.org Music Used: Calm Cinematic Orchestral Underscore http://audiojungle.net/item/calm-cinematic-orchestral-underscore/3082945?WT.ac=search_item&WT.oss_phrase=calm%20cinematic&WT.oss_rank=1&WT.z_author=BCrutchfield Meditation Guide: http://www.tragedyandhopechannel.com/meditation-a-comprehensive-yet-simple-guide/ Meditation and its benefits: http://www.artofliving.org/meditation/benefits-of-meditation http://www.bloomberg.com/news/2013-11-22/harvard-yoga-scientists-find-proof-of-meditation-benefit.html http://www.ineedmotivation.com/blog/2008/05/100-benefits-of-meditation/ Meditation techniques: http://zenhabits.net/meditation-for-beginners-20-practical-tips-for-quieting-the-mind/ Transcendental Meditation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fO3AnD2QbIg http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transcendental_Meditation Created by Tragedy & Hope Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/TragedyandHopeProductions

item.title: Ceci N'Est Pas un Gif: Animating Magritte
item.description:
Ceci N'Est Pas un Gif: Animating Magritte

As contemporary updates to early Northern Renaissance paintings and ukiyo-e woodblock prints have shown, GIFs have become a popular way for artists to revisit and reinterpret art history. The latest works to join this burgeoning genre of remixed animations, created by the German-based illustrator Raphaëlle Martin , were inspired by René Magritte, himself a master of altering the familiar.

item.title: Resist and Thrive
item.description:
Resist and Thrive

Last week I gave this talk at Web Summit in Dublin. It's a first-draft of thoughts that I felt compelled to talk about in a roomful of entrepreneurs and VC's. I'd love to hear any and all thoughts on this topic.

item.title: WordsEyeIn-Beta online app can create vi...
item.description:
WordsEyeIn-Beta online app can create vi...

WordsEyeIn-Beta online app can create visual scenes using 3D graphics based on any input of text:WordsEye is a first-of-its kind web and mobile application that lets you literally Type a Picture using simple language. With Wordseye, you can turn you words into art, visual opinion, greetings, single-panel cartoons, and more.A New Social Network for Creative Expression and Visual Banter.
